it.fabiopizzati.secureudp

Class SecureDatagramSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.DatagramSocket
      • it.fabiopizzati.secureudp.SecureDatagramSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SecureDatagramSocket
extends java.net.DatagramSocket
    Class that adds confidentiality and data integrity features to java.net.DatagramSocket. The class works as a upper layer that, in the send method, encrypts the data, calculate the HMAC for data authentication and then calls the original DatagramSocket send method. In the receive method, the original receive method is called, the data are decrypted and then, finally, the HMAC check is performed.
    Since:
    08-17-2016
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Fabio Pizzati
